content: With the Bee Mountain Stone Soak equipped, using the gourd grants a considerable chance to take a sip without consuming a gourd use. This works great with the Supreme Gourd or the Qing-Tian Gourd
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bee_Mountain_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Bee Mountain Stone'.
The content is as follows:
With the Bee Mountain Stone Soak equipped, using the gourd grants a considerable chance to take a sip without consuming a gourd use. This works great with the Supreme Gourd or the Qing-Tian Gourd
